input_text:
Job Title: Golf Shop Attendant

Location: Phoenix, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, General Business, Management

Description:
Job Summary

The Golf Shop Attendant provides customer service and assists with the daily operations in a golf pro shop.

Qualifications

 Responsibilities 

Typically requires a high school diploma and 0 to 2 years of experience.Possesses beginning to working knowledge of subject matter.Handles basic issues and problems and refers more complex issues to higher-level staff.Performs work under direct supervision.

Job Responsibilities

Operates a cash register and credit card machines to process transactions. Answers customer’s questions about merchandise and provides information pertaining to the course. Assists with tracking inventory and restocking store merchandise including clubs balls tees and other golf equipment or apparel. Organizes merchandise so that the store is in presentable condition. Collects fees from players for each round of golf played and initiates discounts and or promotions for tee times as approved.

 Property Details 

Surrounded by the desert landscape of Phoenix's North Mountain, this all-suite hotel offers luxurious amenities, enjoyable activities and delicious dining options for an unforgettable holiday.

Pointe Hilton Tapatio Cliffs Resort features the Falls Water Village, the perfect place for family fun. The Village features 3 acres of swimming pools with waterfalls and a 150 feet waterslide. Relax in one of the private cabanas while sipping a refreshing drink from the Cascades Cafe.

Company Overview

As the global leader in third-party hotel management, our growing portfolio represents over 1,550 hotels in 49 states and 22 countries, from top international lodging brands to luxury hotels, destination resorts and lifestyle hotels. Our associates around the globe are passionate about serving our guests and driving exceptional results, and thrive in a culture where everyone is inspired to be the best. Join a world of possibility with Aimbridge Hospitality.

Benefits

After an initial waiting period, those hired into full time positions are eligible for a competitive benefits package that includes the following:

 Medical, Dental, and Vision Coverage  Short-Term and Long-Term Disability Income  Term Life and AD&D Insurance  Paid Time Off  Employee Assistance Program  401k Retirement Plan

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Golf Shop Attendant
output_json.summary: The Golf Shop Attendant provides customer service and assists with the daily operations in a golf pro shop.

Answers customer’s questions about merchandise and provides information pertaining to the course.
Assists with tracking inventory and restocking store merchandise including clubs balls tees and other golf equipment or apparel.
Organizes merchandise so that the store is in presentable condition.
Collects fees from players for each round of golf played and initiates discounts and or promotions for tee times as approved.
